name: Guilin
title: Guilin - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Guilin is famous for its stunning karst mountain landscapes along the Li River. Known as one of China's most picturesque destinations, it offers breathtaking natural scenery, traditional fishing villages, and unique limestone formations that have inspired Chinese artists for centuries.

highlights.attractions: Li River Cruise, Yangshuo Countryside, Elephant Trunk Hill, Reed Flute Cave
highlights.cuisine: Guilin Rice Noodles, Beer Fish, Oil Tea, Lipu Taro Loaf
highlights.bestTime: Spring (April-May) and Autumn (September-October) with mild weather

dishes.name: Guilin Rice Noodles
dishes.description: Famous local rice noodles served with savory broth, pickled vegetables, and various toppings.

dishes.name: Beer Fish
dishes.description: Fresh river fish cooked with beer and local spices, a Yangshuo specialty.

dishes.name: Oil Tea
dishes.description: Traditional tea-based soup with various ingredients, unique to the region.

foodStreets.name: Guilin Night Market
foodStreets.description: Vibrant night market with local street food and specialties.

foodStreets.name: Yangshuo West Street
foodStreets.description: Popular tourist area with restaurants serving local and international cuisine.

gettingThere: By Air: Guilin Liangjiang International Airport (KWL) with domestic and international flights
By Train: High-speed rail connects Guilin to major cities including Beijing, Shanghai, and Guangzhou
By Bus: Long-distance bus services from neighboring provinces
gettingAround: Li River Cruise: Scenic boat tours between Guilin and Yangshuo
Bus: Public transportation to major attractions
Bicycle: Popular for exploring Yangshuo countryside

activities: Morning: Visit Elephant Trunk Hill and Fubo Hill
Afternoon: Explore Reed Flute Cave with stunning stalactites
Evening: Walk along the Li River and enjoy local cuisine
Morning: Take Li River cruise to Yangshuo (4-hour scenic journey)
Afternoon: Explore Yangshuo West Street and countryside
Evening: Watch the Impression Liu Sanjie light show
Morning: Bicycle tour through Yangshuo's karst landscape
Afternoon: Visit traditional villages and experience local culture
Evening: Return to Guilin and enjoy river night views
